directions: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients for cookies. Stir until soft dough forms.
Drop cookie dough by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 14 minutes or until edges are light golden brown. Remove from oven and cool 1 minute.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped macadamia nuts (recommended: Mauna Loa)
title: Macadamia-Coconut Cookie
